articles.content: Beyond the usual travel essentials, any keepsakes, charms and totems we take with us on our journeys say a lot about our inner worlds. The faithful may carry a crucifix, a rosary or the Quran; supers… [+2482 chars]

articles.title: What date is the solar eclipse in 2020? Everything you need to know - Wales Online
articles.description: An annular solar eclipse is coming with the moon blocking most of the sun aside from a spectacular ring of fire around the edge - so when are the next eclipses we can watch?
articles.content:
Many of us will remember the amazing spectacle in 2015 when we were treated to Europe's biggest solar eclipse for 16 years.
